name: Andrew Halls
bio: I've been developing iOS apps since the iOS 3.0 days.  I learned  Swift when it first released with the help of exercism.io.  I enjoy helping others learning the language, I always seem to learn a bit more myself.

name: Ai-Lyn Tang
bio: After thinkng about becoming a coder for years, I made the switch in 2018 and absolutely love it. I'm now a full time iOS developer. Look forward to helping you on your Swift journey!
